text: “(allāhgē) dūtayāda (ohuva) viśvāsa kaḷa ayada, (yuddhayen pasu) tamangē pavulē udaviya veta kisi kalekat āpasu nopæmiṇennāha yayi niyata vaśayenma oba adahas karamin siṭiyehuya. (ebævinma oba yuddhayaṭa pæmiṇiyē næta). meyama obagē manasehi alaṁkāravat kara tibuṇi. ebævin oba napuru situvillama sitamin siṭiyehuya. ebævin obama vināśa vana janatāvak bavaṭa pat vūvehuya” (yayi nabiyē! oba pavasanu mænava)
